comments.comment: No politician can understand the politics of the country properly rather than  just flowing. They do not want o understand the principles of democracy even  as they are not keen enough for developing the country. Some have not sufficient brain power to go through and plan. That is the way big bosses have been  controlling the country for last 70 years.  Most of them do not care about the people or developing the country rather than having a luxury life  without thinking much about people. They do not care about great people like Le Quan or the way he developed  what they want is keep the power and control some how. In the agriculture sector  the land is poisoned due use of chemicals and we can see in village areas nothing is growing like before. No body talks just looking fr ways to fill the pockets talking something to the unlearned people inducing colour politics. Only Mr Nagananda came with some principles but  most of the money greedy politicians do not support it. This is what happening to the country they just follow free market system importing everything and getting commission.

comments.comment: Sinhalaya dannema nathuwa hambayo wenawa. Mekata kiyanne Sinhala Hamba Paramparawa kiyala. Hambayo a dawaswala ma patan gatta sellama thamai sinhalal nam aruda karagena poruwa uda nagala bala wayas kara sinhalal kellanwa kasada bandina eka. Eeta passe thamai sellama thiyenne. Colombo 12 Grand pass wald indala Kaduwela Hanwella wenakan avissawella para digatama me sellama thamai kerenne. Oyas wellampitiye asuwunu thamba kambi bomba factoriyath ehema ekak. Policiye OIC ge indala lokka wenakan me dalata ahu wela inne. Kolonnawe Marikkar la thamai mewata mulwela inne. Sinhala modaine danwath nagitapalla

ape hamuduruwo kiyapu de therum ganna me rate eka ballekuta beri una. thawamath un unge paduwe ohe innawa. yako mechchara rata wenuwen anaweki kiyala rata yana pwththa kiyapu un wahanse ada hirabath kanawa. thawamath ape jara deshapaluwo un wahanse gena wachanayak katha karanawada.eth un wahanse eda a kiyapu deshapalakayoma thamai ada me ratata wina karanne. . wereddak nokara minissunta jathiyata ratata sewayak karapu un wahanse ada hirabath kanawa.. eth me ratata wina karapu a kalakanni deshapalakayo , trasthawadeen samaga ek wela me ratatama garahanawa. 
ape hamuduruwo itha ikmanin nidahas karagatha uthui. a wagema unwahanseta dedi arakshawak diya yuthui..
